‚úÖ I. Hardware & Physical Layer - Manual Tasks

options.content:
## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Weekly
- [ ] Visual inspection: Check fan dust accumulation
- [ ] Verify all fans are spinning properly
- [ ] Check for unusual noises or vibrations

### Monthly
- [ ] Clean dust from fans and heatsinks
- [ ] Inspect cable connections for looseness
- [ ] Check UPS battery health indicator
- [ ] Review SMART logs manually: `smartctl -a /dev/sdX`

### Quarterly
- [ ] Run extended SMART tests on all drives
- [ ] Replace UPS batteries if needed
- [ ] Deep clean server chassis
- [ ] Inspect power cable integrity

---
**Note:** Log completions in your maintenance journal or use Loki logging.

panels.title: üìã II. Operating System & Kernel - Automated Checks

options.content:
## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Weekly
- [ ] Review journalctl for recurring errors:
  ```bash
  journalctl -p err -b
  ```
- [ ] Check for available NixOS updates:
  ```bash
  nix-channel --update
  nixos-rebuild dry-build
  ```

### Monthly
- [ ] Apply NixOS system updates
- [ ] Review kernel changes in changelog
- [ ] Check firmware updates available:
  ```bash
  fwupdmgr get-updates
  ```
- [ ] Update BIOS/UEFI if needed
- [ ] Review logrotate configuration

### Quarterly
- [ ] Audit system logs for patterns
- [ ] Document any kernel tuning changes
- [ ] Test system recovery after updates

## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Daily
- [ ] Verify backup job completion logs
- [ ] Check backup size consistency

### Weekly
- [ ] Verify offsite backup sync timestamps
- [ ] Review snapshot retention policy

### Monthly
- [ ] **CRITICAL:** Perform restore test from backup
- [ ] Run ZFS scrub:
  ```bash
  zpool scrub <pool-name>
  zpool status
  ```
- [ ] Check Btrfs balance (if applicable):
  ```bash
  btrfs balance status /
  ```
- [ ] Audit snapshot storage usage
- [ ] Verify replication logs

### Quarterly
- [ ] Test full system restore procedure
- [ ] Review backup retention policy
- [ ] Verify backup encryption keys accessible

## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Weekly
- [ ] Review fail2ban/CrowdSec ban lists
- [ ] Check VPN tunnel status manually
- [ ] Verify certificate expiry dates >30 days

### Monthly
- [ ] Audit firewall rules for obsolete entries
- [ ] Review open ports:
  ```bash
  ss -tulpn
  ```
- [ ] Verify SSH key-only authentication
- [ ] Check ACME renewal logs
- [ ] Audit user access and permissions
- [ ] Rotate API tokens and admin passwords

### Quarterly
- [ ] Review SSO/authentication backend health
- [ ] Audit LDAP/Keycloak user accounts
- [ ] Verify internal CA certificate chain
- [ ] Scan network for rogue devices:
  ```bash
  nmap -sn 192.168.1.0/24
  ```
- [ ] Test VPN failover procedures

## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Weekly
- [ ] Review application error logs in Loki
- [ ] Check systemd service status:
  ```bash
  systemctl --failed
  ```

### Monthly
- [ ] Review slow database queries
- [ ] Check database replication status
- [ ] Verify database backup retention
- [ ] Run database vacuum/analyze (Postgres):
  ```bash
  vacuumdb --all --analyze
  ```
- [ ] Review Redis/cache memory usage
- [ ] Check message queue depths (MQTT/NATS)
- [ ] Audit reverse proxy routing rules

### Quarterly
- [ ] Review application dependency updates
- [ ] Test application restore from backup
- [ ] Audit consumer service health
- [ ] Review load balancer backend health

## Manual Maintenance Tasks

### Weekly
- [ ] Review container logs for errors
- [ ] Check for container restart loops

### Monthly
- [ ] Remove stale Docker images:
  ```bash
  docker system prune -a
  ```
- [ ] Review container resource limits
- [ ] Verify container network isolation
- [ ] Check VM guest agent health
- [ ] Review QCOW2 disk usage
- [ ] Prune old VM snapshots

### Quarterly
- [ ] Review NUMA placement for VMs
- [ ] Audit container security policies
- [ ] Test VM live migration
- [ ] Review orchestration cluster health (K8s/Nomad)
